35.eng-name: Sales in which a Price is paid for Goods to be Delivered Later (As-Salam)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Bakhtari at-Tai:I asked Ibn `Abbas about Salam for (the fruits of) date-palms. He replied "The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade the sale a dates on the trees till they became fit for eating and could be weighed." A man asked what to be weighed (as the dates were still on the trees). Another man sitting beside Ibn `Abbas replied, "Till they are cut and stored." Narrated Abu Al-Bakhtari: I heard Ibn `Abbas (saying) that the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade ... etc. as above

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّلَمِ إِلَى مَنْ لَيْسَ عِنْدَهُ أَصْلٌ
chapter.eng-name: As-Salam to a person who has got nothing
